column1: description
A bunch of Divers came in, bragging about their last expedition, and spent a real fortune.
A couple of ex-monks sang church songs the whole night. It was surprisingly good.
An agitated tourist stormed in looking for someone. They were immediately kicked out.
A drunk Diver started preaching about the sins of humanity and how they should be punished.
A gambling table somehow accumulated 30,000 DC in stakes. The whole place was watching.
A fight broke out.
Somehow, the place ran out of whiskey.
A generous Diver bought drinks for everyone, the whole night.
Someone was killed. No one’s sure what happened.
The staff got sick, all at once. Or so they say.
Two Divers got in a screaming match over what the Àrsaidh really looked like.
A new Diver who wanted to make some friends drew caricatures for anyone who asked. He was good.
KSA security came looking for someone.
Two Divers got into a fight over who had seen the worst things while on an expedition. One of them is still at the medical center.
Someone lit a fire and the whole place had to be evacuated.
A Diver desperately tried to recruit others for an expedition to the last planet they visited. They swore there were rivers of molten gold.
The place was unusually gloomy. The mood was dark and everyone spoke in whispers.
A drunk Diver showed off their new augmentations by lifting people above their head.
A new guy was trying to sell his services as a hypnotist.
An impromptu stand up show brought everyone to tears.
